m_szDocTitle: First (Pre-Production) Chevy Bolt Comes Off The Assembly Line
m_szDocSumamry: First (Pre-Production) Chevy Bolt Comes Off The Assembly Line March 24th, 2016 by Steve Hanley   Originally published on Gas2 . Michelle Malcho, spokeswoman for GM’s Chevy cars unit, tells Fortune that the first pre-production Chevy Bolt has rolled off the assembly line at the company’s factory in Orion, Michigan. “For us, this shows movement,” Malcho says. “We’re not just talking about it, we’re doing it.” That may be a not so subtle dig at Tesla, which has been chronically late getting cars to market on time in the past.
